text: Justice Bowen may refer to: *Charles Bowen, Baron Bowen, a Lord Justice of Appeal of England *Jabez Bowen, a Chief Justice of the Rhode Island Supreme Court *Ozias Bowen, an Associate Justice of the Ohio Supreme Court *Thomas M. Bowen, an Associate Justice of the Arkansas Supreme Court *William H. Bowen, an Associate Justice of the Arkansas Supreme Court
title: Justice Bowen
